compress-pdf.name: Compress PDF
compress-pdf.description: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality

seo.title: Free Online PDF Compressor
seo.content: Compress PDF files to reduce their size while preserving quality. Perfect for email attachments and uploads. Works entirely in your browser — no data is sent to any server.

faq.q1: How much can the file size be reduced?
faq.a1: Compression results vary depending on the PDF content. Documents with many images typically see the largest reductions, often 50-80% smaller. Text-heavy PDFs may see smaller reductions.
faq.q2: Does compression reduce the quality of my PDF?
faq.a2: The tool uses smart compression that targets embedded images while preserving text sharpness. The result is visually very close to the original in most cases.
faq.a3: Password-protected PDFs need to be unlocked first. Use our Unlock PDF tool to remove the protection, then compress the file.
faq.q4: Will compressing a PDF reduce its quality?
faq.a4: The compression algorithm is designed to minimize quality loss while maximizing file size reduction. For text-based PDFs, compression typically has no visible impact on quality. For image-heavy PDFs, you may notice slight quality reduction at higher compression levels, but the tool intelligently balances compression and quality to maintain readability.
faq.q5: Can I compress password-protected or encrypted PDFs?
faq.a5: No, password-protected or encrypted PDFs must be unlocked before compression. Use our Unlock PDF tool first to remove password protection by providing the correct password, then compress the unlocked file.

ui.noReduction: File is already optimized, no further reduction possible.

unlock-pdf.name: Unlock PDF
unlock-pdf.description: Remove password protection from PDF files

seo.title: Free Online PDF Unlocker
seo.content: Remove password protection from PDF files directly in your browser. Unlock PDFs to enable editing, printing, and copying. Free, private, no upload needed.

faq.q1: What types of PDF protection can be removed?
faq.a1: The tool can remove both user passwords (required to open the PDF) and owner passwords (that restrict editing, printing, or copying). You must know the password to unlock the file.
faq.a2: Yes, as long as you have the right to access the PDF. This tool is designed for users who know the password but want to remove it for convenience. Never use it on files you do not own.
faq.q3: Will the PDF content be changed?
faq.a3: No. The tool only removes the password protection. All content, formatting, images, and metadata remain exactly the same.
faq.q4: What if I don't know the PDF password?
faq.a4: This tool requires you to provide the correct password to unlock the PDF. It cannot crack, bypass, or recover lost passwords. If you've forgotten the password, you'll need to contact the document owner or creator to obtain it.
faq.q5: Will the unlocked PDF retain all its original content and formatting?
faq.a5: Yes, unlocking a PDF only removes the password and security restrictions without altering any content, formatting, images, hyperlinks, or metadata. The unlocked file is functionally identical to the original except that it no longer requires a password to open.

pdf-fill-sign.name: Fill & Sign PDF
pdf-fill-sign.description: Fill PDF forms and add your signature online for free

seo.title: Free Online PDF Fill & Sign Tool
seo.content: Fill out PDF forms and add your signature directly in the browser. No upload, no account needed. Completely free and private — your files never leave your device.

faq.q1: Can I fill out any PDF form?
faq.a1: Yes, the tool detects all standard PDF form fields (text fields, checkboxes, dropdowns) automatically. If your PDF has interactive form fields, they will appear in the Fill Form tab for you to complete.
faq.a2: This tool creates a visual signature (an image placed on the PDF). For most informal purposes and many business documents, this is sufficient. For legally binding electronic signatures that meet eIDAS or ESIGN standards, you may need a qualified digital signature service.
faq.a3: Absolutely. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your PDF and signature never leave your device — nothing is uploaded to any server.
faq.q4: Are the signatures I create legally valid?
faq.a4: Digital signatures created with this tool can serve as legally valid electronic signatures in many jurisdictions, particularly for agreements where parties consent to electronic signing. However, legal validity depends on local laws. For documents requiring certified digital signatures with cryptographic verification, you'll need specialized software.
faq.q5: Can I save a partially filled form and complete it later?
faq.a5: Yes, you can download the PDF at any stage with whatever information you've already entered. The filled fields and any signatures you've added will be saved in the PDF. You can then re-upload this partially completed PDF later to continue filling out remaining fields.

pdf-editor.name: PDF Editor
pdf-editor.description: Edit text, draw, and annotate your PDF documents

seo.title: Free Online PDF Editor with Text Editing
seo.content: Edit PDF text directly in your browser with automatic font and size detection. Add text, draw, annotate. Free, private, no upload needed — your files never leave your device.

faq.q1: Can I edit existing text in a PDF?
faq.a1: Yes. Click on any text in the PDF and the editor will detect the original font family, weight, and size. You can then modify the text and it will be rendered with a matching standard font at the same position.
faq.q2: What fonts are used for edited text?
faq.a2: The editor detects whether the original font is serif, sans-serif, or monospace, and whether it is bold or italic. It then uses the closest matching standard PDF font (Helvetica, Times, or Courier family) to redraw edited text.
faq.a3: Absolutely. All processing happens directly in your browser using pdf-lib and pdfjs-dist. Your PDF never leaves your device — nothing is uploaded to any server.
faq.q4: Can I edit the original text in a PDF or only add new text on top?
faq.a4: The tool can add new text overlays on any PDF with full font and formatting control. For natively-generated PDFs, you may be able to select and modify some existing text. For scanned PDFs or image-based documents, you can only overlay new text on top of the existing content.
faq.q5: Will the fonts I use in editing be embedded in the final PDF?
faq.a5: Yes, fonts used for new text are embedded in the PDF to ensure the document displays correctly on any device, even if the recipient doesn't have those fonts installed. The tool includes a selection of standard PDF fonts that render reliably across all platforms.

image-converter.name: Image Converter

faq.q1: What image formats can I convert?
faq.a1: You can upload images in JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, SVG, HEIC (iPhone photos), AVIF, TIFF, and ICO formats. The tool auto-detects the format from the file's actual data, not just the extension.
faq.a2: You can convert to JPG (best for photos, smallest size), PNG (lossless, supports transparency), or WebP (modern format, great compression with transparency). All conversions happen in your browser.
faq.q3: Can I convert HEIC photos from my iPhone?
faq.a3: Yes! Simply upload your .heic files and convert them to JPG, PNG, or WebP. The conversion happens entirely in your browser — your photos are never uploaded to any server.
faq.q4: Can I convert HEIC photos from my iPhone to JPG?
faq.a4: Yes, our converter fully supports HEIC to JPG conversion. Simply select your HEIC photos, choose JPG as the output format, and convert. The tool preserves image quality and EXIF data including date, location, and camera settings.
faq.q5: What's the difference between WebP and JPG?
faq.a5: WebP is a modern format by Google that typically produces 25-35% smaller files than JPG at equivalent quality. WebP supports both lossy and lossless compression, transparency (like PNG), and animation (like GIF). While JPG is more universally compatible, WebP offers superior compression for web use.

faq.q2: How can I control the GIF file size?
faq.a2: Use the FPS and width controls. Lower FPS (5-10) and smaller width (320px) create smaller files. Higher FPS (15-20) and larger width (640px) produce smoother, larger GIFs.

faq.q5: Can I control the animation speed?
faq.a5: Yes, you can adjust the frame rate (FPS) to speed up or slow down the animation. Lower FPS creates slower playback and smaller files, while higher FPS produces smoother motion but larger files.

seo.title: Free PDF to PDF/A Converter Online
seo.content: Convert PDF files to PDF/A-1b archive format for long-term preservation. Embeds all content and adds conformance metadata. Free, in-browser.

faq.a1: PDF/A is an ISO-standardized format for long-term digital preservation. It ensures the document can be reproduced exactly the same way in the future by embedding all required resources.
faq.a2: The tool produces PDF/A-1b (basic conformance) which ensures visual appearance preservation. All content is embedded as images with XMP metadata marking conformance.

faq.q4: What's the difference between PDF/A-1b, PDF/A-2b, and PDF/A-3b?
faq.a4: PDF/A-1b (2005) is the most restrictive and widely supported. PDF/A-2b (2011) allows JPEG 2000 compression, transparency, and digital signatures. PDF/A-3b (2012) permits embedding files of any format within the container. Choose based on your archival institution's requirements.
faq.q5: Will converting to PDF/A increase my file size?
faq.a5: Usually yes, because PDF/A embeds all fonts, color profiles, and removes compression that relies on external resources. The increase is typically 10-30%. This trade-off ensures the document remains self-contained and readable indefinitely.

seo.title: Convert PDF to Grayscale Online Free
seo.content: Free online tool to convert color PDFs to grayscale. Save on printer ink or create black and white versions. All processing in browser.

faq.a1: Each page is rendered and converted to grayscale using luminance-based conversion, then reassembled into a new PDF.
faq.a2: File size may increase or decrease depending on the original content. Grayscale images typically use less data.
faq.a3: Pages are rendered at 2x resolution and saved as high-quality JPEG for good output quality.

seo.title: Redact PDF Online Free — Black Out Sensitive Text

faq.a1: Yes, redacted text is covered with black rectangles and cannot be recovered from the output file.
faq.a2: Yes, enter multiple search terms separated by commas.
faq.a3: All processing happens in your browser. No files are uploaded to any server.

faq.q2: Can I download all pages at once?

faq.a3: No page limit. All pages in the PDF are extracted.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How Tuttilo protects your privacy and handles your data.
privacy.intro: At Tuttilo, your privacy is our top priority. All file processing happens entirely in your browser — your files are never uploaded to our servers.

noDataCollection.title: We Don't Collect Your Files
noDataCollection.content: Tuttilo is a browser-based tool suite. When you process a PDF, image, video, or any other file, the processing happens locally on your device using JavaScript and WebAssembly. No file data is ever sent to our servers or any third party.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: We may use anonymous analytics (such as page views and tool usage counts) to improve our service. This data contains no personally identifiable information and cannot be linked to any individual user.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Tuttilo uses only essential cookies for basic functionality such as language preference and theme selection. We do not use tracking cookies or advertising cookies.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our website may load resources from content delivery networks (CDNs) for fonts and JavaScript libraries. These services may receive your IP address as part of standard web requests. We do not share any personal data or file content with third parties.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Since we do not collect or store your files, there is no file data to retain. Any preferences stored in your browser (such as language or theme) remain on your device and can be cleared at any time through your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR and other privacy regulations, you have the right to access, correct, or delete any personal data. Since Tuttilo does not collect personal data or files, these rights are inherently respected by our architecture.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at the address listed on our Contact page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using Tuttilo tools.
terms.intro: By using Tuttilo, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Tuttilo provides free browser-based tools for processing PDFs, images, videos, audio, and text. All processing occurs locally in your browser. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree to use Tuttilo only for lawful purposes. You are solely responsible for the content you process. You must not use the service to process illegal, harmful, or rights-infringing content.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: The Tuttilo name, logo, and website design are our property. The tools are provided for your personal and commercial use. You retain all rights to the files you process.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Tuttilo is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our tools, including but not limited to data loss, file corruption, or processing errors.

warranty.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
warranty.content: We make no warranties about the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of our tools. Results may vary depending on your browser, device, and file format. Always keep backup copies of your original files.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any tool or feature at any time without notice. We may also update these terms, with changes becoming effective upon posting.

law.title: Governing Law
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the European Union. Any disputes shall be resolved in the competent courts.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please visit our Contact page.

about.title: About Tuttilo
about.intro: Tuttilo is a free, all-in-one online tool suite that works entirely in your browser.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe powerful tools should be free and accessible to everyone. Tuttilo was built to give you professional-grade file processing without subscriptions, registrations, or uploads.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.content: Unlike traditional online tools, Tuttilo processes everything directly in your browser using JavaScript and WebAssembly. Your files never leave your device — there are no uploads, no servers involved, and no waiting in queues.

features.title: Why Tuttilo
features.privacy: 100% Private — Files never leave your browser
features.free: Completely Free — No subscriptions, no hidden costs
features.noReg: No Registration — Use any tool instantly
features.fast: Lightning Fast — No uploads, no server queues
features.languages: 8 Languages — Available in English, Italian, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Japanese, and Korean
features.tools: 36+ Tools — PDF, images, video, audio, text, and developer tools

categories.title: Our Tools
categories.pdf: Organize, compress, convert, and unlock PDF files.
categories.image: Compress, resize, crop, and convert images in any format.
categories.video: Compress, trim, and convert videos. Create GIFs.
categories.audio: Cut, convert, and record audio directly in your browser.
categories.text: Count words, compare text, and generate lorem ipsum.
categories.developer: JSON formatter, Base64 encoder, regex tester, QR code generator, and more.
categories.youtube: Download YouTube thumbnails in all resolutions.

openSource.title: Open & Transparent
openSource.content: Tuttilo is built with Next.js, React, and modern web technologies. All processing is client-side, which means you can verify our privacy claims by inspecting the network tab in your browser — no file data is ever transmitted.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with the Tuttilo team.
contact.intro: Have a question, suggestion, or found a bug? We'd love to hear from you.
